Bloodthirst.NAME: Bloodthirst
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, heal 1 HP.

Complexity.NAME: Complexity
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Skill, this enemy loses 1 Strength for this turn.

GlassSkin.NAME: Glass Skin
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain Block and Frailty.

WitchProtection.NAME: Witch's Protection
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain block at the start of your turn for the amount of Frail, Weak, and Vulnerable you have.

Minimalism.NAME: Minimalism
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, Exhaust 1 card and gain 1 [E].

BlakkMist.NAME: Blakk Mist
DESCRIPTIONS: Your Weak, Vulnerable, and Frail no longer wear off.

Crumbling.NAME: Crumbling
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked, loses strength equal to the damage dealt to it.

Leaking.NAME: Leaking
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose Souls at the end of your turn.
